p: In both cases, strong diffraction peaks attributed to the iron plate and Mn 2.5(HPO 4)(PO 4)(H 2O) 2 coating are observed. The relative intensity of the manganese hydrogen phosphate hydrate phase increases with growing manganese content in the phosphating bath. A low-alloy-steel sample of the same size as the Mn 2.5(HPO 4)(PO 4)(H 2O) 2 phase is the smallest for the manganese Mn 2% bath with d~32 nm, whereas, for the lowest Mn concentration bath, the crystallite size is approximately 36 nm.
